member.name: M:Syncfusion.XForms.UWP.Buttons.SfSegmentedControl.IsAnimationDisabled
member.summary: Disable the selection strip animation while moving from or to beyond the selected index. The following cases, we don't need the animation of SelectionStrip moves 1) CurrentSelectedIndex is in visible range but previous SelectedIndex is negative value then 2) CurrentSelectedIndex is kept negative value , but previous SelectedIndex in in visible range 3) CurrentSelectedIndex is in visible range but previous SelectedIndex is outof our collection 4) CurrentSelectedIndex is from outof our collection but previous SelectedIndex in visible range
